name: Magnetic Storm
description: Contain a powerful device that transmits the magnetic field nearby, producing an electric tornado that throws enemies into the air.

advancement.description: Increase volt damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Those caught in tornadoes have a **50%** chance to be disoriented for **3** seconds each time they take damage. Movement direction inputs will also be swapped.
